description: Core project setup must be complete before TypeORM integration.
Entities must be defined before migrations can be generated.
CI/CD pipeline must be functional to deploy the service for integration testing of new features.
mitigation_plan: Allow manual deployments to staging if CI/CD is blocked, but with tech lead approval.
impact_if_delayed: Sprint 2 features cannot be tested in an integrated environment.

description: The product deletion task requires an API from the Order Management service to check for active orders. This API contract must be defined and a mock/staging version available.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mock server based on a defined OpenAPI contract. Begin integration testing as soon as the real endpoint is available.
impact_if_delayed: VND-011 cannot be completed and will slip to the next sprint.

description: The error report generation logic builds upon the core CSV processing worker.
